bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG
) 
 

Gets the number of microseconds passed on the given timer.

Parameters:
referenceId An id to refer to a particular timer
Returns:
the number of microseconds passed as a long long (so it can handle all valid values & -1)

vector< int > Timer::getTimerIds (  bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG  ) 
 

Gets a list of the ids for all available timers.

Useful if timers are started running automatically

Returns:
a vector of all the ids of existing timers
